title: ninna dhyAnava
sahitya:
ninna dhyAnava koDO enna dhanyana mADO pannaga shayana shrI purandara viTTala


caraNam 1    ambuja nayananE ambuja janakanE ambujanAbha shrI purandara viTTala
    caraNam 2    pankaja nayanaE pankaja janakanE pankajanAbha shrI purandara viTTala
    caraNam 3    bhAgIrathi pita bhAgavatapriya yOgiGalarasanE shrI purandara viTTala
